name: webcollections-browser
description: Edit local osu collections on beatmap page

scripts.build: parcel build src/background/background.ts src/content/content-script.ts src/options/options.ts src/popup/popup.ts --experimental-scope-hoisting --public-url ./
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/background/background.ts src/content/content-script.ts src/options/options.ts src/popup/popup.ts --public-url ./

author: Shaddy
